digital-experience-healthcare/contact.ht.overview: The Contact Us page for Digital Experience Healthcare provides a responsive, accessible form for users to submit inquiries, along with contact details, success/error banners, and FAQ content. It includes navigation, theme toggle, and validation-ready form fields with ARIA support.

digital-experience-healthcare/main.js.overview: This JavaScript file initializes interactive behaviors for a healthcare website, including theme toggling, back-to-top visibility, skip-to-content accessibility, CTA tracking, search/filter/sort of service cards, FAQ accordion persistence, and tabbed content management. It also logs analytics events for user interactions.
interactions: Click theme toggle to switch between light/dark modes
Scroll to trigger back-to-top visibility
Click back-to-top to smooth scroll to top
Click skip-to-content to focus main content
Click CTA links to log analytics events
Type in search input to filter cards
Click filter chips to toggle active state and filter cards
Change sort dropdown to reorder visible cards
Click FAQ buttons to expand/collapse panels and persist state
Click tab buttons to switch visible panels
data_flow: User actions trigger DOM updates and analytics logging via logEvent()
Theme preference stored in localStorage under 'theme'
FAQ open state stored in localStorage under 'faq-open-index'
Search/filter/sort functions manipulate DOM visibility and order of service cards
Analytics events appended to window.analyticsLog array

Filter chips use aria-pressed to indicate active state
Tabs use aria-selected, aria-hidden, and tabindex for keyboard navigation
FAQ panels use aria-controls and aria-expanded for screen reader support

It establishes design tokens, responsive grid layouts, typography, accessibility helpers, and container spacing for consistent UI rendering across breakpoints.
